verses.roman:
śrī-rūpe dekhiyā prabhura prasanna haila mana
'uṭha, uṭha, rūpa, āisa', balilā vacana

synonyms: śrī-rūpe dekhiyā—seeing Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prasanna—very pleased; haila—was; mana—mind; uṭha—please stand up; uṭha—please stand up; rūpa—My dear Rūpa; āisa—come; balilā—He said; vacana—the words.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very pleased to see Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī, and He told him, "Stand up! Stand up! My dear Rūpa, come here."
